function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in building height standards between different countries and regions","Impact":"Challenges in adapting car parking spaces into educational spaces during pandemics","Mitigation":"Update building regulations and codes to include standard dimensions of adapted spaces","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM) for space planning","People":"Architects, urban planners, government building regulators","Owner":"Government building regulatory authority"},{"Description":"Differences in floor area standards for parking bays","Impact":"Challenges in transforming parking bays into functional spaces for education during pandemics","Mitigation":"Standardize floor area configurations for parking bays across different countries and regions","Technologies":"Virtual reality (VR) for space visualization","People":"Architects, urban planners, government building regulators","Owner":"Building design and planning professionals"},{"Description":"Exposure to contagion due to close proximity in transformed spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in adapted spaces","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure ventilation, air quality, and social distancing in the adapted spaces","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purification technology","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, facility managers","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams"}]}
